name: 100% Orange Juice: Yuki & Tomomo Renewal Pack
summary: 100% Orange Juice - Yuki & Tomomo Renewal Pack adds 2 new playable character combinations from developer Orange Juice's games. Meet Yuki (Dangerous), who disrupts the play by seeking wins through trap use, and a brand new version of the game's end boss: Tomomo (Casual) who can upgrade to Tomomo (Sweet Eater) if she can just bother to...
